bluej.codecoverage.main

Interface CodeCoverageModule

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlueJCodeCoverageModule

    public interface CodeCoverageModule
    Represents the information controller for any data needed from an BlueJ.

    Instances of this interface should be singleton, and only 1 should be used during a plugin's lifetime.

    Author:
    Ian
    See Also:
    BlueJCodeCoverageModule

      Manager for all specific preferences, like what the line colors for coverage should be.

    • Method Detail

      • getPreferenceStore

        PreferenceStore getPreferenceStore()
        Preference wrapper that allows for saving and load preferences.
        Returns:
        the current extension's preference storage.

      • getPreferenceManager

        PreferenceManager getPreferenceManager()
        Manager for all specific preferences, like what the line colors for coverage should be.
        Returns:
        the current preference manager.

      • getBlueJFrame

        java.awt.Frame getBlueJFrame()
        The active BlueJ Frame.

        This is used for centering dialogs and opening windows in the proper location.

        Returns:
        the currently active BlueJ frame.

      • getCoverageUtilities

        CoverageUtilities getCoverageUtilities()
        Utilities used by the extensions.

        All management of the Jacoco agent occurs in this class, including starting the server, starting coverage sessions, and ending coverage sessions.

        Returns:
        the current utilities instance.

      • getCoverageDirectory

        java.io.File getCoverageDirectory()
        Directory that the coverage agent should scan when looking for source files.
        Returns:
        base directory for coverage source files.

      • getReportFrame

        CoverageReportFrame getReportFrame()
        The current coverage JFrame.
        Returns:
        coverage JFrame.
